pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model-Agnostic Interpretations with Forward Marginal Effects // Create local, regional, and global explanations for any machine learning model with forward marginal effects. You provide a model and data, and 'fmeffects' computes feature effects. The package is based on the theory in: C. A. Scholbeck, G. Casalicchio, C. Molnar, B. Bischl, and C. Heumann (2022) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2201.08837.
